question.text:
Which of the following summarises Stanley Greenspoon's opinion on the hiring of unqualified teachers for French immersion classes?
A It demonstrates that the quality of the nation's teacher training colleges is at stake.
B It is a waste of public money that harms the prospects of a younger generation.
C It is presented as a cheap fix but will have expensive consequences in the long run.
D It will backfire because the government lacks the money to attract outsiders to schools.
